text: (vari sankhyanu gurinci) kondarantaru: "Varu mugguru, nalugavadi vari kukka." Marikondarantaru: "Varu ayiduguru aravadi vari kukka." Ivi vari uhaganale. Inka kondarantaru: "Varu eduguru, enimidavadi vari kukka." Varito anu: "Vari sankhya kevalam na prabhuvuke telusu. Varini gurinci kondariki matrame telusu." Kavuna nidarsanam lenide varini gurinci vadincaku. Mariyu (guha) varini gurinci virilo evvaritonu vicarana ceyaku
